summary: Forge an (stand alone) Imperial Mail Armor at the smithy
descriptionHtml:
================================================================
The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim

Mail Armors | 0.2

Textures and ESP made by Frisicus

Special Thanks to,
	-Bethsoft Game Studio
================================================================
Installation instructions
----------------------------------------------------------------
1- Extract the archive to your \"Skyrim\" folder.

2- Make sure that esp files can be added to your launcher, you might have to change a setting in the skyrim.ini (add:\"[Launcher]
bEnableFileSelection=1\")

3- Assign MailArmor.esp to your launcher

4- Launch Skyrim
================================================================
Mod Description
----------------------------------------------------------------
This mod is the beginning of what will be an expansion of the available armors, to be more specific mail armors (the term chain mail is a tautology). Currently these kind of armors are under represented in Skyrim, this expansion will hope to make some change.

The armors are not for sale at the merchants, neither will you find NPC\'s wear the armors. This will have to wait until the Creation Kit comes out in January.

Instead the armors can be smithed at the forge! Though for a reasonable amount of resources.
================================================================
Version History
----------------------------------------------------------------
0.2
- Added a female version of the Imperial Mail Armor

0.1
- Made an ESP file which contains the current Imperial Mail armor and smithing ability. Now you won\'t have to replace a \'vanilla\' armor.

0.09
- Created textures for the armor (Photoshop CS-II) and fitted them on the mesh (NifSkope).
